text:
Um, excuse me, doctor?
Hello.

Fellow-- fellow doctor.
Hi. How are you?

Sorry I can't stay and chat,
but I'm doing some doctoring

of my own in exam room B,
which is-- thank you.

Yeah, I just needed
a second opinion.

Doctor? Doctor?
Thank goodness!

We have a massive pimple
that's ready to blow.

- Come!
- No.

- ( shouts )
- No, I don't want to!
( groans, sobs )

That was the biggest zit
I've ever seen!
( sobbing )
Ooh, that's nasty.

Okay,
now I've got to find dad.
Exam room B! Okay.
Hey, Dad. Hey.
A little more.
( muttering )
Hey, Raven.

They gave me drowsy
to make me medicine.

Don't worry, Dad. I'm going
to get you out of here.
You're a doctor now?
How long have I been asleep?

Booker? Booker,
what are you doing here?
And who is watching Alice?

Mom, why are you dressed
like a doctor,

and what are you doing
with Grandpa Vic?

I'm the mama.
I ask the questions.
Now where is Alice?
Okay, fine. She's--

- Uh, right there.
- She's right there!

Where I knew she was
the whole time.

- Now what are you doing?
- Okay, so I had a vi--
Hey, little girl I don't know.

This is a family
conversation so...
Thank you so much.
Listen, I had a vision

that something bad was
going to happen to my dad,

so I'm busting him
out of here.

- Are you sure?
- I am absolutely sure.

Trust me.
I saw it clear as day.

The doctor said,
"Oh, no. We lost him!"

So there is no way
I am losing my dad.

Oh, snap!
I lost my dad!
